Burma: Pegu made capital of Toungoo Kingdom
Colombia: Cacica Gaitana starts the Paezan revolt against the Spanish conquest Foundation of Neiva by Juan de Cabrera Foundation of Honda, Tolima by Gonzalo Jiménez de Quesada Gonzalo Suárez Rendón founded the city of Tunja
India:
Battle of Chausa fought between Humayun and Sher Shah Suri in which Humayun defeated.
Guru Angad Dev becomes second guru of Sikhs.
